query.sql:
SELECT '本月开支' AS account_name, IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(dr_amount,0)-IFNULL(cr_amount,0)),0) as totalexp, 1 AS priority FROM exp_item i, exp_item_line l, exp_account a WHERE i.item_id = l.item_id AND i.period_id = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m') AND a.account_type ='0' AND a.account_id = l.account_id and i.book_id = ${@book_id} and l.book_id = ${@book_id}
UNION
SELECT a.account_name, IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(dr_amount,0)-IFNULL(cr_amount,0)),0) as totalexp, a.priority FROM exp_item i, exp_item_line l, exp_account a WHERE i.item_id = l.item_id AND i.period_id = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m') AND a.display_in_home = 1 AND a.account_type ='0' AND a.account_id = l.account_id and i.book_id = ${@book_id} and l.book_id = ${@book_id} GROUP BY a.account_id order by priority
limit 5

query.name: getCurrentPeriod

sqls.executeSql: insert into exp_period( period_id, period_code, period_name, status, book_id, priority) values( ${@period_code}, ${@period_code}, ${@period_name}, "A", ${@book_id}, ${@period_code})
